nodes.text: Major General was a military rank within the Galactic Empire. Shortly after the Battle of Scarif and shortly before the Battle of Yavin, Chief of the Imperial Army aboard the DS-1 Death Star Mobile Battle Station and member of the Joint Chiefs Cassio Tagge held the rank. Cassio Tagge was eventually promoted to the rank of Grand General, and placed as the Supreme Commander of the Imperial Military.
The rank was identified in the French Star Wars Encyclopedia by Altaya in 2021 as "Général de division," which translates to "Major General" in English.
